# Government Tender Announcement
## Contract Details
* **Term Reference Number:** WS4117783864
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4117783864
* **Release Date:** August 18, 2023
* **Closing Date:** September 15, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT

## Contract Description
Canada is seeking proposals to acquire one (1) self-contained soil sampling push core rig for the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC). The equipment will be used to measure soil quality, nutrient levels, and soil carbon stocks.

## Contract Evaluation Criteria
* Lowest Price

## Business Requirements
Amendments:

* Please disregard the original closing time and deadline for bidding.
* All supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by September 15, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT. Bids submitted after this time will be deemed non-responsive.

## Contact Information
Contracting Authority:
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau (Quebec), K1A 0S5, Canada

Bid Submissions:
* Send your proposal to the above address or via electronic submission.

Inquiries:
* Oana Lee (elle-la / she-her)
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* oana.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

# Important Notice
Please note that a modified Ariba Discovery posting response and Buyandsell posting closing time will be disregarded. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the specified closing date to ensure a responsive bid.

You may refer to the official tender notice documents on the [Ariba Discovery portal](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17207683?extsite=MTcyMDc2ODNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for further details.

This cover letter gives the maximum information, while minimazing clutter, to make the details clearer and more understandable. Functionality and note-taking is simplified within the formatted design.

We followed the outline of the following key points:
* H1 Section Title, separated from its description by a single blank line
* Bulletin of basic facts:
	+ inclusion of heading that matches the standardized style
	+ Section presentation texts, separated via blank lines
* Proper statements of unobjectionable characteristics 
* Supply alias
